name: Swords & Adventures
description:
Classic RPG, direct and simple.

Choose from the Barbarian, Elf or Wizard and enter a fantasy world where terribles and dangerous enemies await you.

You can win experience beating your enemies, earn and trade with powerful artifacts... Here's everything you expect of a good adventure.

Swords and Adventures is the fast and addictive RPG you were looking for.

Swords and Adventures is the ideal game for short but extremely intense games. Dare you enter?

Enjoy this new remake, with improvements over the classic game!

Languages: English, Spanish and French.

http://4waystudio.es/
